project_name: OFFGUN FAN MEETING IN HONG KONG 2024
venue_name: 安盛創夢館, Go Park AXA Dreamland, Go Park

venue_info.venue_address: 香港新界西沙大埔海映路9號，西沙GO PARK. 9 Hoi Ying Road, Tai Po, Hong Kong

project_info:
票价说明：
港币票面价（HKD）：1880/1580/1180/880大麦人民币售价(CNY)：1880/1580/1180/880，门票已含中国港澳台服务费。
配送说明：
本项目不支持退换，购票成功的客户，请您提前规划好行程以及办理好港澳通行证-中国香港签注。演出当日凭购票二维码到安盛创梦馆KKLIVE门票换领柜台扫码核验换取实体门票（订单或订单截图无效），感谢您的支持与理解。
取票场馆：AXA安盛创梦馆取票地址：新界西沙海映路9号西沙GO PARK取票时间：演出当天15:00-20:00
 
📣📣OffGun 粉丝召集📣📣✨泰国当红 CP OffGun 再次袭港！✨相信参加完上一年fan meeting 嘅Babii 已经好挂住佢哋两个😘 当大家仲追紧新剧，睇紧 Gun 作为一名实习生点样同 Off 呢位副指导擦出甜蜜社内火花之际，我哋已经悄悄地为咁多位 Babii 准备惊喜，送上 OffGun Fan Meeting in Hong Kong 2024 💚‼️
📣📣Calling all OffGun fans📣📣✨Thailand's famous CP OffGun is coming to Hong Kong again ! ✨ While you guys are still catching up on OffGun ’s new drama, watching Gun as an intern and how he sparks a sweet office romance with Off, the deputy director, we have prepared surprises for all Babii - OffGun Fan Meeting in Hong Kong 2024 💚‼ ️💚OFFGUN FAN MEETING IN HONG KONG 2024 💚🍸 演出日期 Show Date：10 August 2024 (SAT)🍸 演出时间 Show Time：20:00🍸 演出地点 Show Venue：安盛创梦馆 AXA Dreamland🎫 票价 Ticket Price：HKD $1,880 / $1,580 / $1,180 / $880 😍粉丝福利：合照、击掌、亲笔签名海报、明信片
⏰ 发售时间 Ticket Sale：12PM on 15 JUL
✦ 福利换领机制、日期、时间和详细步骤将另行公布。✦ The redemption mechanism, including date, time and detailed procedures will be further announced.
✦ 演出当天福利进行的安排依照KKLIVE社交平台公布为主，主办单位将保留最终决定权。✦ Benefit arrangements on event day will be according to the later announcement on KKLIVE social media platforms. Organizer reserves the rights for the final decision to all fan benefits arrangements.
